Assessment and Evaluation


Assessments

See the Assessments for "Bystander Intervention to Address COVID-19 Related Harassment in School Environments".

L1 and L2 Evaluation: Immediately Following the Program Implementation

See the L1 and L2 Evaluation Protocols to be administered immediately following the program implementation and Performance Rubric with evaluation criterion. The Kirkpatrick Model of Evaluation will be applied throughout.

L3 and L4 Evaluation: Delayed for a Period After Implementation

See the L3 and L4 Evaluation Protocols to be administered 6 months after the program implementation. The Kirkpatrick Model of Evaluation will be applied throughout.
